query.name: teacher_query
query.sql: SELECT teacher_name, teacher_id FROM fnd_teacher t where t.teacher_code = ${@user_code}

SELECT l.line_id, l.description, l.score, l.teacher_comment, l.grade, (select count(1) from sys_upload_file f where f.table_name ='job_lines' and pk_value = line_id) att_num, (select c.code_name from sys_code c where c.code='JOB_LINE_STATUS' and c.code_value= l.status ) status FROM job_lines l WHERE l.line_id = ${@line_id}

query.name: header_query
query.sql: SELECT title, class_id, header_id, (select c.class_name from fnd_class c where c.class_id = t.class_id) class_name, course_id, status status_code, (select concat(concat(b.branch_code,'-'),b.branch_name) from fnd_branch b,fnd_course c where b.branch_id = c.branch_id and c.course_id= t.course_id) course_name, (SELECT code_name FROM sys_code t where t.code='JOB_STATUS' and t.code_value= status) status_name, end_time, (select teacher_name from fnd_teacher te where te.teacher_id = t.teacher_id) teacher_name, (select count(1) from sys_upload_file f where f.table_name ='job_headers' and pk_value = header_id) att_num, t.last_update_by, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') create_date, DATE_FORMAT(t.last_update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') last_update_date, (select CONCAT(CONCAT(user_code,'-'),user_name) from sys_user where user_id =t.last_update_by) last_update_user FROM job_headers t where t.teacher_id = (SELECT teacher_id FROM fnd_teacher s WHERE s.teacher_code = ${@user_code}) #AND_CLAUSE# order by t.create_date desc
